text: @HillaryClinton Comparing apples to oranges and furthering the hate filled Dem agenda. Since hospitals are being paid more for Covid-19 cases, we may never know the real lower number. NY was handled terribly. In MA more than 60% are from nursing homes/long-term care facilities. etc. etc. etc.
